name: Sukhanov Ukrainian Kitchen
text:
SUKHANOV
Ukrainian Kitchen

SOUPS
Borscht $12 Gluten Free
Transcarpathian Bograch $14.50 Gluten Free

MAIN COURSE
Cabbage roll $7.95 Gluten Free
Chicken risotto ball $7.95 Gluten Free
Stuffed peppers with beef, quinoa, bacon $11.50 Gluten Free
Perogies with potatoes and bacon $9.90 contains gluten

SALADS
Five colors salad $12 Gluten Free
(tomato, sweet pepper, fresh cucumber, feta cheese)
Four colors salad $12 Gluten Free
(tomato, sweet pepper, fresh cucumber,)

DESSERTS
Honey cake $9.50 contains gluten
Coconut cookie $5 Gluten Free
Tiramisu $6 contains gluten
Cheesecake $9.50 contains gluten

DRINKS
Coffee $3, Tea $2, Pop $3, Water $1

12pm-2pm LUNCH $25
Soup + Main Course + Salad + Drink
5pm-7pm DINNER $30
Maine Course + Salad + Dessert + Drink
BREAKFAST

The cost of breakfast is 10 dollars, and a drink is included.

#1 - Croissant sandwich

2 pieces Salami, cheese, lettuce and ranch.

#2 - Muffins with tuna and egg

2 pieces Muffin, cream cheese, tuna, egg, and avocado

#3 - Omelette with pesto and parmesan

Eggs, pesto, parmesan, sausage, toast.

#4 - Finnish pancakes

with cottage cheese and maple syrup
